content.College Info: Central University of Kashmir, located in Ganderbal, is a prestigious A NAAC accredited government institution offering world-class university programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through CUET and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • Undergraduate

    B.Sc (Honours/Research): Biotechnology, Zoology, Botany, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics; B.Sc Nursing; B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering; B.Ed; B.A (Honours): Economics, Political Science, Urdu, English, Education, Integrated BA LLB; BBA; BCA; B.Voc; Integrated B.Sc-M.Sc Biotechnology; Integrated B.Sc-M.Sc Zoology; Integrated B.Sc-M.Sc Physics

  • Postgraduate

    M.Sc: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Zoology, Botany, Biotechnology, Information Technology, Environmental Science; M.Tech Computer Science & Engineering, Structural Engineering; MA: Convergent Journalism, English, Economics, Urdu, Political Science, Education, Islamic Studies, Tourism Management; MBA; LLM; M.Ed; M.A Education; Integrated B.Ed-M.Ed; PG Diploma: Guidance and Counselling, Cyber Security, Tourism, Urdu; MCA

  • Research

    M.Phil and PhD in select Science, Management, Education, Social Sciences and Humanities fields
